alert.note: Alert for Switzerland (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 01 at 12:57AM EDT until April 01 at 1:30AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 AM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN SWITZERLAND...SOUTHERN KENTON...SOUTHERN BOONE... GRANT...OWEN...NORTHWESTERN PENDLETON AND EASTERN GALLATIN COUNTIES... At 1256 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Walton to 10 miles southwest of Owenton, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Independence, Williamstown, Walton, Union, Crittenden, Dry Ridge, Owenton, Ryland Heights, Glencoe, Corinth, Sparta, Patriot, Monterey, Gratz, Stewartsville, Elk Lake, Visalia, Atwood, Ryle and Northcutt. This includes the following Interstates... I-71 in Kentucky between mile markers 60 and 77. I-75 in Kentucky between mile markers 144 and 176. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM EDT for southeastern Indiana...and northern Kentucky. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
